sentences.sContent: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.sCn: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.sContent: ...But a university degree unaccompanied by a gain in knowledge or skills is an empty achievement indeed...
...and ultimately concluded that single-sex education is not the answer to gender gaps in achievement — or the best way forward for today's young people...
...and science achievement that should be narrower...

...They examine this relationship by analyzing schools' sports winning percentages as well as student-athletic participation rates compared to graduation rates and standardized test score achievement over a five-year period for all public high schools in Ohio...
...the better kids perform on measures of educational achievement and psychological adjustment...

words.tran: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

trans.tranCn: 完成； 成就， 成绩
trans.tranOther: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts
